summary: The research was a quantitative study using 4th grade participants from a Title 1 elementary  school in Central Illinois . Data was gathered from students participating in this study through the Pearson enVision Math series with Topic Tests, Discovery Education Assessment results, and attendance  records being used . The results show that 1:1 Technol impacts and effects the academic achievement of students .

Journal of Applied and Advanced Research, 2018: 3(Suppl. 1) S33S35 . The impact of modern technology in education has impacted different facets of education . Technology has certainly changed the way we live .
